SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.context

Class AppContext

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.context.AppContext
public class AppContext extends Object
Singleton class that represents the global application context.

The AppContext class manages global settings and properties such as screen dimensions, target frames per second (FPS), and audio volume. These settings are accessible throughout the application and are implemented using JavaFX's observable properties for seamless integration with the UI or other components.
